item.title: Nothing Phone 3 Launch Seems Confirmed For Early 2025: When You Might Get It - News18
item.description:
Nothing Phone 3 Launch Seems Confirmed For Early 2025: When You Might Get It

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: News18

Nothing has announced plans for the launch of the Phone 3, which is expected to debut in early 2025, possibly in March. The device is rumored to integrate AI features into its interface and apps.

  • The Phone 3 is speculated to launch in Q1 2025, with a likely release date in March.
  • It will be marketed as a flagship device with advanced UI capabilities utilizing AI technology.
  • Previous models like Phone 2a aimed at the mid-range market, suggesting a shift back to premium offerings.
  • Nothing plans to introduce Phone 3a and 3a Plus models later in 2025.
“Phone 3 will be a flagship phone and become a landmark smartphone launch in Q1 this year.” - Carl Pei, CEO of Nothing

The anticipation for the Nothing Phone 3 indicates the brand's intent to create a strong presence in the flagship segment, hoping to meet or exceed the expectations set by its predecessors.

item.title: Top Mid-Range 5G Smartphones You Can Buy In India - News18
item.description:
Top Mid-Range 5G Smartphones You Can Buy In India

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: News18

Buying a reliable 5G phone in the mid-range segment can be a tough task these days. So here's a list of models that you can consider.

Best 5G Smartphones To Buy In India

  • Motorola G35 5G: Priced around Rs 10,000, it features stock Android and a 5,000 mAh battery.
  • Samsung Galaxy M15 5G: Offers a 6.50-inch display and a 6000mAh battery with fast charging.
  • OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G: Comes with a 6.72-inch display and 108-megapixel primary camera.
  • Redmi 13 5G: Features a 6.79-inch display and supports 33W rapid charging.
  • Moto G85 5G: Provides a curved display and is known for its gaming and multitasking abilities.
“Buying a reliable budget smartphone with 5G capabilities, things get a little complicated.”

These models are some of the best choices for those looking to purchase a 5G smartphone in India within a mid-range budget.

item.title: Urban Company hires banks for IPO, likely to file by March-end | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Urban Company Hires Banks for Upcoming IPO Expected by March-End

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Mint

Urban Company is preparing to file draft papers for a ₹3,000 crore initial public offering (IPO) by the end of March 2024. The platform has engaged major banks for this process.

  • Urban Company plans to file for a ₹3,000 crore IPO by the end of the March quarter.
  • Prosus-backed, the company is currently valued at approximately $2.1 billion as of June 2021.
  • Kotak Mahindra Capital, Goldman Sachs, and Morgan Stanley have been appointed as managers for the IPO.
  • The IPO will consist of both new and existing shares.
“The company has last valued itself at $2.1 billion. This move marks a significant step in its growth trajectory.”

In conclusion, Urban Company's upcoming IPO signifies its strategic growth move and potential expansion in the home services market.

item.title: [CES 2025] A New Era of Personalized Appliances: Samsung Showcases Home AI Innovations - samsung.com
item.description:
Samsung Unveils Home AI Innovations at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Samsung Newsroom

At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, Samsung Electronics showcased its vision for the smart home with the introduction of Home AI, a suite of AI solutions designed for personalized living spaces.

  • Home AI includes features like personalized scheduling assistance powered by Bixby.
  • Bixby can manage household tasks like cleaning and laundry remotely when users are away.
  • Intruder detection and monitoring enhance home security via AI-powered appliances.
  • The exhibition highlights a focus on convenience, user experience, and robust security measures.
"Samsung’s vision of interconnected AI appliances that seamlessly integrate into the household reflects a forward-thinking approach to innovation."

The Home AI innovations aim to enhance convenience and efficiency in daily household management, indicating a new era in home automation.

item.title: Adobe launches new GenAI Firefly tool for retailers - TechTarget
item.description:
Adobe Launches New GenAI Firefly Tool for Retailers

Publication Date: January 13, 2025   |   Source: TechTarget

Adobe has introduced Firefly Bulk Create, a new generative AI tool designed to help retailers efficiently produce marketing content at scale.

  • Firefly Bulk Create automates repetitive tasks in the content production cycle.
  • The tool allows for resizing marketing assets, including background swaps using generated images.
  • Competitors like Google are also launching AI tools for retailer efficiency.
"[Firefly Bulk Create] gets the idea out of a creative mind and into exploration and iteration faster," said Liz Miller, Constellation Research analyst.

While beneficial for large retailers, questions remain on its value for medium-sized or small retailers facing budget constraints.

item.title: Google may redesign the volume UI in Android 16, and here's a first look - Android Authority
item.description:
Google May Redesign the Volume UI in Android 16: A First Look

Publication Date: November 2024   Source: Android Authority

Google is making significant changes to the volume slider and panel in the upcoming Android 16 update, transitioning from thick, pill-shaped sliders to a new design featuring thinner, continuous sliders with handles. The changes aim to align with Google’s Material Design 3 guidelines.

  • Google is working on a new design for Android’s volume slider and volume panel.
  • The new design replaces thick, pill-shaped sliders with thinner, continuous sliders with handles.
  • The launch date of this redesign is uncertain, but it is expected to appear in the Android 16 update.
“Its simplicity makes it easier to estimate the exact volume level of a particular volume stream.”

This redesign is part of a broader UI update expected in Android 16, which aims to enhance user experience across the platform.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Samsung expands Galaxy Ring sizes: New sizes 14 and 15 available starting January 22 - The Financial Express
item.description:
Samsung expands Galaxy Ring sizes: New sizes 14 and 15 available starting January 22

Publication Date: January 22, 2025 | Source: Financial Express

Samsung is set to expand its Galaxy Ring lineup by introducing new sizes 14 and 15, available from January 22. The larger sizes aim to cater to a broader range of users and enhance competition with other smart ring manufacturers.

  • New sizes 14 and 15 will be available from January 22, 2025.
  • Galaxy Ring to come in three colors: Titanium Black, Silver, and Gold.
  • Samsung aims to compete with Oura, which offers sizes 4 to 15.
  • Galaxy Ring to be accessible in 53 markets by February 2025.
  • Samsung is enhancing the Health app to support the Galaxy Ring with sleep improvement features.
“The addition of larger sizes ensures that more individuals, particularly those at the higher end of the sizing spectrum, can comfortably use the device.”

This expansion reflects Samsung's commitment to accommodating a wider customer base while enhancing product integration through health-focused features in its applications.

item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: Samsung is adding two new Galaxy Ring sizes - The Verge
item.description:
Samsung Introduces Two New Sizes for Galaxy Ring

Publication Date: January 22, 2024

Source: Samsung News

Samsung is expanding the availability of its Galaxy Ring by introducing sizes 14 and 15, allowing more people to find their fit.

  • The new sizes will be available starting January 22nd.
  • Galaxy Ring sizes now range from five to 15, varying in availability by market.
  • The new sizes aim to compete with Oura, which offers its smart ring in sizes four to 15.
  • Current larger sizes 12 and 13 feature bigger batteries for longer life.
  • The launch will also see the Galaxy Ring sold in 16 additional countries from February 7th.
“Even if you’re able to slide the ring on, it could be hard to take it off again as your fingers swell.” - Victoria Song

With these additions, Samsung aims to cater to a wider audience and enhance user experience across different markets.

item.title: iPhone Users Facing Call Drop And Network Issues In India After Installing iOS 18 Update: Report - News18
item.description:
iPhone Users Facing Call Drop And Network Issues In India After Installing iOS 18 Update: Report

Last Updated: January 13, 2025, 16:37 IST

Source: News18

Many iPhone users had been looking forward to the iOS 18 update, but reports now suggest it has resulted in significant connectivity issues, including call drops and faster battery drain.

  • A survey indicates that 60% of iPhone users have experienced call drop and network issues post-update.
  • The survey received feedback from over 45,000 users, highlighting substantial concern about the update.
  • Network issues are impacting the use of OTT apps for calls, such as WhatsApp and Signal.
  • Despite the issues, 90% of those surveyed upgraded to the iOS 18 version.
  • Users are hoping for fixes in the upcoming iOS 18.3 update.
"6 out of 10 iPhone users are noticing network and call drop issues in the country."

The experiences shared by users indicate a significant impact of the iOS 18 update on their devices, emphasizing the need for Apple to address these issues in upcoming updates.

item.title: Xiaomi Pad 7 With iPad-Like Display Launched In India: Price, Features - News18
item.description:
Xiaomi Pad 7 With iPad-Like Display Launched In India: Price, Features

Date: January 13, 2025

Source: News18

Xiaomi Pad 7 has launched in India featuring a new Snapdragon Gen chipset and a nano-textured display, positioning itself as a competitor to the iPad.

Key Points:

  • Costs Rs 27,999 for the 8GB+128GB variant and Rs 30,999 for the 12GB+256GB variant.
  • Features a 144Hz refresh rate, 360Hz touch sampling rate, and Dolby Vision support.
  • Powered by Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 chip with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.0.
  • Equipped with a 13MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera.
  • Includes a large 8,850 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.
“We are hoping Xiaomi does not change its Android promise with the Pad 7 which was recently confirmed for the previous model.”

The Xiaomi Pad 7 represents a significant upgrade in the tablet market in India, particularly for mid-range devices.

item.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Promises Smarter AI, Sleeker Designs & Big Savings - DesignRush
item.description:
Galaxy Unpacked 2025 Promises Smarter AI, Sleeker Designs & Big Savings

Publication Date: January 22, 2025 Source: Samsung Electronics

Samsung Electronics is set to revolutionize mobile AI at Galaxy Unpacked 2025 on January 22 in San Jose, California. The event will unveil the highly anticipated Galaxy S25 series, featuring cutting-edge AI capabilities, alongside new devices and exclusive pre-order offers.

  • The Galaxy S25 series includes the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, S25 Ultra, and potentially a new Galaxy S25 Slim.
  • Devices will have thinner designs, Snapdragon 9 Elite processors, enhanced cameras, and faster charging.
  • Samsung’s next evolution in Galaxy AI aims for more natural user interactions.
  • Upgraded virtual assistant Bixby is expected, offering advanced capabilities.
  • Samsung’s XR headset, possibly named “Galaxy Switch,” may also make an appearance.
  • Rumored Galaxy Ring 2 will include larger sizes and AI-driven health tracking features.
“Can you put it on my calendar?” a teaser AI voice ad asks.

Beginning January 6, Samsung offers a $50 reservation credit towards the latest devices and the chance to win a $5,000 gift card, with pre-orders providing up to $1,250 in savings.

item.title: Bigger, Smarter, Better: The Best TVs Unveiled at CES 2025 - Analytics Insight
item.description:
Bigger, Smarter, Better: The Best TVs Unveiled at CES 2025

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Tech News

The curtains have closed on CES 2025, but the buzz surrounding its futuristic TV lineup still has tech enthusiasts abuzz. This year's exhibition showcased cutting-edge displays, smart capabilities, and entertainment solutions that are redefining the boundaries of innovation.

  • LG’s Rollable OLED TV: Features improved rolling mechanism and light intensity, aimed at revolutionizing home entertainment.
  • Samsung Neo QLED TV: Designed specifically for gaming with low input lag and high refresh rate, utilizing AI Quantum Mini LEDs.
  • Sony A95L: Quantum Dot OLED technology producing 200% more colors, includes eco-friendly power-saving features.
  • Hisense 8K TV: Affordable 8K model priced under $3,000, offers excellent quality and performance.
  • TCL’s 115-inch Mini-LED TV: World’s largest Mini-LED TV with new local dimming capabilities for optimum display.

Quick Stats

  • 48% of attendees prefer TVs with AI features.
  • Over 70% of new TVs focus on being eco-friendly.

2025 is shaping up to be an exciting year for home entertainment with the arrival of impressive new TVs that promise to elevate the viewing experience.

item.title: Apple Watch SE 2025 leaks: New look, plastic build and enhanced features tipped | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Apple Watch SE 2025 leaks: New look, plastic build and enhanced features tipped

Publication Date: 2023-10-11 Source: Bloomberg

Apple is reportedly gearing up to launch the third-generation Apple Watch SE, which may feature a plastic build and a new design, making it more affordable and accessible.

  • The new Watch SE is expected to have a fresh look with a shift to a plastic shell.
  • It may come in a wider range of colors, enhancing its appeal.
  • Flagship models like the Apple Watch Series 11 and Watch Ultra 3 are also expected to be released, focusing on functional enhancements.
  • The Watch Ultra is rumored to include satellite connectivity and support for 5G RedCap.
  • Apple aims to integrate health features, including high blood pressure detection.
  • The new models are expected to be unveiled in September 2025.
“Both the Series 11 and Ultra 3 are expected to feature a high blood pressure detection capability, marking a major step forward in health tracking.”

This new generation of Apple Watches signifies Apple's commitment to affordability and health innovation as they expand their product ecosystem.

item.title: Oppo is about to launch the world's thinnest foldable phone - Mashable
item.description:
Oppo is about to launch the world's thinnest foldable phone

Publication Date: February 2023 Source: Mashable

Oppo is poised to take the spotlight with its upcoming Oppo Find N5, claiming it will be the thinnest foldable phone in the world, significantly thinner than current models.

  • Oppo teases a foldable phone that is thinner than a common pencil.
  • The phone is expected to feature a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and a triple 50-megapixel rear camera.
  • The launch is anticipated in February, with limited availability primarily in China.
“A foldable phone this thin feels like having your cake and eating it too — you get that extra screen real estate without sacrificing pocketability.”

The Oppo Find N5 marks a significant advancement in smartphone design, catering to users seeking both portability and functionality in foldable devices.

item.title: Watch Gemini Live get chatty about YouTube videos in this demo (APK teardown) - Android Authority
item.description:
Watch Gemini Live get chatty about YouTube videos in this demo (APK teardown)

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Android Authority

Google is developing a new feature for Gemini Live that will allow users to engage in conversations about YouTube videos they're watching. Although currently unavailable, a demo showcases its potential.

  • Google is working on a new feature that will allow users to converse with Gemini Live about the YouTube videos they are watching.
  • This feature is not yet available, but you can catch it in action in the demo video below.
  • Google is also working on a similar functionality for the PDFs you view.
Google’s vision for Gemini is for it to be the only AI assistant you need for any task, including free-flowing conversations.

In addition to file uploads, two new features, “Talk Live about video” and “Talk Live about PDF,” were activated in the latest Google app beta.

These features allow users to discuss content within the context of videos or PDFs without needing to access the Gemini app directly.

Stay tuned for updates on when these features will be officially released.

item.title: Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra Global Launch Date Set for February 6 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra Will Be Launched on This Date in February

Publication Date: N/A | Source: Gadgets 360

The Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra is set to launch globally on February 6, 2024, featuring cutting-edge specs and new AI photography capabilities.

  • Launch date is February 6 at 2:30pm Taipei time (12pm IST).
  • Expected to have a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and 50-megapixel camera.
  • Innovative AI-backed mobile photography features are anticipated.
  • Previous model, Zenfone 11 Ultra, was launched in March 2024.
  • Specifications include a 5,800mAh battery and possibly charging support.

“A new era of mobile photography excellence” - Asus on the upcoming Zenfone 12 Ultra.

The Asus Zenfone 12 Ultra aims to enhance user experience in photography with advanced AI features, setting a benchmark for future models.

item.title: OPPO Reno13 Review: A beautiful mix of style and performance - CNBCTV18
item.description:
OPPO Reno13 Review: A Beautiful Blend of Style and Performance

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: CNBC TV18

The OPPO Reno13 5G combines stunning design with powerful performance, intended as a strong mid-range smartphone option.

  • Price starts at ₹37,999.
  • Available in Luminous Blue and Ivory White colors, with the Blue variant featuring a unique glowing effect.
  • Thin design at 7.29mm and weighs 181g, made with aerospace-grade aluminum and glass.
  • Features a 6.59-inch 120Hz smart adaptive display with 1.5K resolution.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor, ensuring smooth performance.
  • Equipped with a 5,600mAh battery and 80W fast charging.
  • Camera setup includes a 50MP main camera, an 8MP ultra-wide-angle, and a 2MP monochrome lens.
  • Special underwater photography capabilities allow for shooting up to 2 meters deep for 30 minutes.
"The OPPO Reno13 5G combines style, new ideas, and top-notch performance."

The OPPO Reno13 stands out as a stylish, high-performance smartphone suited for users looking for quality under ₹40,000.
